message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing [Product Name] and I think it would be a great fit for you. I'm asking for $150 for it. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of making a lower offer. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
Bob, I appreciate your interest! While $120 is a good offer, I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my asking price.  Would you be willing to pay $135?
I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $130. Would you be willing to meet me halfway and sell it to me for $130?
